page.title: 17Religious Life
page.content: All the major denominations are repre- sented in the area,with non-conformism very strong. Some have active congre- gations of all ages and of a wide social spectrum. Others have smaller numbers dominated by the elderly. Various united services take place in the year organised by the United Sun- day Schools of Risca and Crosskeys, with annual marches through the vil- lages. Most of the buildings are over 70 years old, some being local land- marks e.g.Moriah Chapel.The Crosskeys Pentecostal building is now greatly enlarged.The Machen area has a smaller number and range of institutions than Risca, several chapels having been closed and converted or demolished. The Anglican church has the strongest fellowship in Machen,though Ebenezer Chapel presents a bright front with its new black and white repainting.
